alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 29 at 9:01PM MDT until March 30 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Bennett County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Along with the strong winds, accumulating and blowing snow may lead to slippery road conditions and lowered visibilities tonight into tomorrow morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
